summary.title: Summary
summary.content: I design and build performant full-stack applications using React, TypeScript, Node, Go, and modern cloud architecture

experience.title: Professional Experience
experience.subtitle: This is my journey until now

description: Developed and integrated Google social login with Amazon Cognito for user authentication.
Implemented an AI agent using WebSockets for real-time blueprint graph layout generation.
Established Stripe payment processing for secure and efficient subscription management.
Developed microfrontends using ReactJS and Single-SPA, making the system significantly lighter, more modular and easier to maintain
Optimized the processing of thousands of loan proposals, increasing analyst productivity by 10x per day by reducing analysis time from minutes to seconds through caching and performance enhancements
Improved site performance with advanced optimization techniques including React Suspense, lazy loading, and efficient state management, ensuring a fast and responsive user experience
Mentored junior developers through knowledge sharing, code reviews, and technical guidance to accelerate their professional growth
Implemented comprehensive test suites using Playwright and Jest, enhancing component reliability and ensuring high-quality deliverables
Designed and implemented an innovative EVTL registration system for civil engineering projects, streamlining data entry and ensuring accurate documentation
Integrated S√£o Paulo government APIs to automate address validation, reducing manual errors and improving operational efficiency by 40%
Developed an interactive map interface using Google Maps API, enabling users to visualize and edit location data in real-time
Built the platform with ReactJS, NextJS and Node.js, delivering a responsive and intuitive user experience
Developed a business portal using ReactJS serving 300+ clients, enabling efficient store management and operations
Architected Node.js microservices that processed thousands of daily transactions, providing real-time data to both customer portals and POS systems
Implemented AWS solutions including SQS queues, Lambdas, and EventBridge for reliable and scalable data processing
Created a blog platform with ReactJS, Contentful (headless CMS), and GraphQL for dynamic content management
Optimized platform performance through data-driven analysis of business metrics and user behavior
Built a self-service business onboarding system using ReactJS, TypeScript and Redux, eliminating manual registration processes
Implemented secure document storage with SQL that complied with banking security standards (PCI DSS)
Developed progressive data persistence with Redux, allowing users to resume interrupted registrations
Created a high-performance banking portal with ReactJS for account management and configurations
Led development of the company's React Native mobile app, delivering cross-platform banking functionality
Developed a real-time truck tracking interface with dynamic location updates and route visualization
Built a driver management system with performance analytics and historical data reporting
Created interactive dashboards for fleet management that improved operational decision-making
Maintained and enhanced the company web platform using JavaScript and jQuery
Optimized RESTful APIs built with PHP and Laravel that served the tracking system
